full_summary:
### Government Tender announcement for Miscellaneous Grocery Products
#### Contract Title *:06 GW6527

### Tender Overview
A Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) has been issued by Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) on behalf of the Correctional Service of Canada (CSC) for the acquisition and delivery of miscellaneous grocery products for CSC's Housing Units in Quebec, Canada. The tender is categorized under Goods and Services (GD), and the Notice Type is classified as a Request for Standing Offer.

#### Key Tender Details
* **Reference Number:** WS3697278636
* **Solicitation Number:** WS3697278636
* **Publication Date:** November 23, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date:** December 8, 2022 at 14:00 Eastern Standard Time (EST)

#### Procurement Method and Evaluation Criteria
This tender is subject to competitive and open bidding. The contract award will be based on the Lowest Price criterion. Tenderers are required to submit their bids electronically through the Government of Canada's ePortal system.

#### Contract Duration and Delivery
The contract duration is expected to be until November 22, 2024, with delivery locations in Laval, Sainte-Anne-des-Plaines, and Cowansville, Quebec, Canada.

#### Requested Goods and Services
The requested goods and services include various types of grocery products, such as nuts and seeds, organic and non-OGM meats and poultry products, fish, eggs and egg substitutes, dairy products, baked goods, and prepared soups and stews. The complete list of requested goods and services is included in the Solicitation Documents.

#### Contact Information
For more information, please contact Anna Caruso at anna.caruso@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca or visit the following URL: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14717522?extsite=MTQ3MTc1MjJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

#### End User Department
The end user department for this contract is the Correctional Service of Canada (CSC), with a contact address of 340 Laurier Ave W, Ottawa, ON K1P 0P9, Canada.

Note: The rewritten entry adheres to the original information, but with a more professional and concise tone. It is crucial to double-check the formatting, as it might get altered during the cut-and-paste process. Markdown format has been applied
